short_summary: Supply, delivery, installation, training, and support & maintenance services for five (5) scanners
description: Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) and Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) requires the supply, delivery, installation, training, and support & maintenance services for five (5) scanners.
full_summary:
## Date of Publication
The public notification of the tender for the Scanning Equipment requirement was published on March 28, 2023.

## Solicitation Information
The solicitation number for this requirement is WS3785747079. The Reference Number for this requirement is WS3785747079-Doc3861176189.

## Tender Details
**Request for Proposal**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal for Scanning Equipment on behalf of Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) and Indigenous Services Canada (ISC).

**Supply, Delivery, Installation, Training, and Support/Maintenance Services**
The requirement includes the supply, delivery, installation, training, and support/maintenance services for five (5) scanners. Four (4) scanners are for the National Capital Region (NCR) mailroom in Gatineau, Quebec, and one (1) for Winnipeg, Manitoba.

**Trade Agreements**
The government has indicated a willingness to accept bids from suppliers who are eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Notice and Attachment**
The notice and attachment (if available) can be found at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15833326?extsite=MTU4MzMzMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15833326?extsite=MTU4MzMzMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**
